title: For and while loop comparison - correct error

content.question: Which of the following changes can be made to Code Segment 2 so that the outputs of the two code segments are identical as intended?

choices.label: Move the statement  x = x + 1;  so that it follows the print statement inside the loop body.
Rename the variable  x  to be  i  so that it is the same variable name as in Code Segment 1.
Remove the statement  x = x + 1;  because this statement is not in the loop body in Code Segment 1.
Change the statement  x = x + 1;  to be  x++;  so that the increment of the loop control variable is the same in both code segments.

content.answer: Move the statement  x = x + 1;  so that it follows the print statement inside the loop body.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
